snippet: J. J. Yeley will drive the No. 83 car in Sunday’s Nascar Sprint Cup race in Brooklyn, Mich., after Ryan Truex crashed during practice Saturday and was taken to a hospital with a concussion.
abstract: JJ Yeley will drive the No. 83 car at Nascar Sprint Cup race after Ryan Truex crashed during practice and was taken to hospital; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: J. J. Yeley will drive the No. 83 car in Sunday’s Nascar Sprint Cup race in Brooklyn, Mich., after Ryan Truex crashed during practice Saturday and was taken to a hospital with a concussion.

headline.main: Driver out of Race After Crashing in Practice
headline.print_headline: Driver Out of Race After Crashing in Practice
